oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-07-02 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 2, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ray Price (host/performer), guest performer Jan Howard, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Jimmie Selph, Jimmy Day, Archie Campbell, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1082nd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Archie Campbell; Jan Howard; Del Wood; Ray Price
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ray Price introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Ray Price) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Ray Price) (recording) -- Ray Price introduces Jan Howard -- Many Dreams Ago (Jan Howard) -- Grant Turner introduces Del Wood -- Yes Sir, That's My Baby (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Ray Price announce his tour schedule -- Heartaches By The Number (Ray Price) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ray Price) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner) -- Station announcements (Grant Turner) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Jackson, Tommy; Day, Jimmy, 1934-1999; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Selph, Jimmy; Campbell, Archie; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Howard, Jan (Vocalist); Zinkan, Joe
